name: Beetle Elf
description:
Play as a cute mini elf,
Start an adventure in a human city.

The game uses an open world,
Each city can accommodate up to 4,000 players simultaneously.

Huge human city, Convenience store, coffee house, street vendor
Use the unique mini-elf point of view to shuttle between the crowds


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Player in the game
The main goal is to Capture, Cultivate, and then direct the various beetles to fight.

Can catch a variety of world-renowned beetles
And each beetle has a three-stage growth change.
Give players more nurturing and evolution of fun.

And in the game, you can beetles fighting at any time with people.
All Calculation are performed in the server, there is no cheat space.

Of course, besides the beetles fighting,
Players can also explore in the city. Challenge all kinds of powerful BOSS.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Although beetle fighting is the main goal of the game,
But you can outside of the beetle battle,
Find a place to be green. Cultivate a variety of flowers and plants.

Harvesting various plants
In addition to allowing your beetles to eat a meal,
Can also be made into a variety of potions that can strengthen the properties of beetles.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Incarnate into a cute elf,
In a huge city.
Began to be the king of beetles!
